name: Bruschetta
description: Grilled bread rubbed with garlic and topped with olive oil and salt. Discover the artistry of flavors, where every bite is a celebration of gastronomic perfection.

name: Dahi Vada
description: A melange of spices, chutney, crunchy vada, yoghurt and freshly chopped coriander. Discover the artistry of flavors, where every bite is a gastronomic perfection.

name: Veg Spring Rolls
description: A traditional Chinese savory snack where a pastry sheet is filled with vegetables, rolled & fried. Discover the flavors, where every bite is a gastronomic perfection.

name: Scone
description: A scone is a traditional British baked good, popular in the United Kingdom and Ireland. Discover the artistry of flavors, where every bite is a gastronomic perfection.

name: Croissants
description: Espresso shots topped with hot water create a light layer of cream culminating in this wonderfully rich cup with depth and nuance

name: Aloo Tikki
description: A golden fried-potato patty that is often stuffed with peas or dal and served with a variety of spicy chutneys and sometimes chickpeas

name: Pav Bhaji
description: A vegetable curry (bhaji) cooked in tomato gravy and served with a soft bread roll (pav). Discover the artistry of flavors, where every bite is a gastronomic perfection.

name: Crispy Corn
description: Crispy corn is popular in restaurant menu, deep-fried crunchy sweet corn kernels are tossed in spices and sauces. Discover the artistry of flavors.
